options.(description): ELanguage
2-character country code; required
ESteamRealm
Count of tags to return, as tagids.  Maximum 20.
Include short description, publisher, developers
includes the games support for languages: supported, full_audio, subtitles
'esrb', 'pegi', ...
't' for teen, 'm' for mature, ...
Additional descriptors like 'Intense Violence', 'Strong Language',...
ESRB-specific
Age in years.  Store pages will prompt with an age gate
An image corresponding to the rating.
URL where the image should link for more information.
EResult of this lookup action
Indicates this app is visible in other regions, but not the requested reagion
The URL of this item's store page, to be appended to STORE_BASE_URL.
If this is an app, or a single-app package, the steamworks appid.
Type of app (Game, Software, Music).  For packages/bundles, this will be the most interesting type (eg Game + Soundtrack bundle will have type Game)
For packages/bundles, all types of included items
For packages/bundles, all included appids
Local ratings agency information, like ESRB or PEGI
The cheapest way for the user to acquire this app or package (may be a bundle).
Different ways to buy this app or packages (packages can be purchased directly, but may also be included in bundles).
Additional packages or bundles associated with an app, but that do not contain the app.
Navigate to this URL (relative to store home) when the store capsule for this item is clicked, instead of the default /app/... URL. Used by advertising apps that point to a sale page.
Information about a free weekend offer.
If true, item is only accessible on store via a direct link
For creators and tags, how many games belong to them
For DLC, Demos, etc, this is the main app.
Categories like Single Player, Multiplayer, MMO
Categories indicating supported features like Steam Cloud, VAC, Achievements, etc
Categories indicating controller support and full controller support.
Review summary with review bombs removed (if any).  Always present (if include_reviews set in request)
Review summary with review bombs included.  Only present if there are review bombs.
A string like 'Mixed', 'Negative', 'Overwhelmingly Positive'
A custom string specified by the partner for display on or around a capsule on the store, e.g. 'Just Updated!'
Optioanl field indicating this name is associated this the creator home via the clan account id
Format for URLs, should substitute the capsule name for ${FILENAME} in the URL.
Equivalent to GetConstantRatioHeaderImage in PHP; apps will always have this, packages and bundles may not.
A wider header used on package/bundle pages.  Not set for apps.
748x896 version of hero capsule.
300x450 - tall library asset
600x900 - tall library asset
960x310 or 1920x620 - library detail background asset
1920x620 or 3840x1240 - library detail background asset
32x32 jpg uploading via steamworks under community assets
The date this item first released on the Steam store.  For Early Access graduates, this is their graduation day.
Optional; the date this item first released elsewhere, typically back catalog items.
For Early Access graduates, the date the game first appeared on Steam.
Is the app coming soon?  This flag should be preferred to doing time comparisons against steam_release_date.
Can the app be preloaded?  Only applies to Coming Soon titles.
Custom release date string.  steam_release_date will be unset if this is set.
Release date should be displayed as month-year only.  steam_release_date is the last day of the month.
One of 'date_full', 'date_month', 'date_quarter', 'date_year', 'text_comingsoon', 'text_tba'
The name of the package or bundle
Always set.  Includes any applicable non user-specific discounts.
If discounted, this is the price the item would normally cost.
Always set.  Formatted with currency symbol and decimal, like '$10.00'.
If discounted, calculated from final price and original price.
If this is a bundle, the savings from buying the bundle.  If no bundle items are on active discount, this will be the same as discount_pct.
Discounts included in discounted_price_in_cents.
Additional discounts included in user_discounted_price_in_cents.
Additional user-specific discounts that do not apply to the current user.
This is a commercial license
Don't show the discount percentage on a store capsule for this item.
Screenshots suitable for all ages.
Screenshots that may contain mature content; these should only be shown after verifying age (age gate).
Path to file on media CDN.  Can access sized version by appending to SHA: '.1920x1080', '.600x338', '.116x65'
Screenshots should be displayed in order of ascending ordinal; they are returned in-order but client may need to merge all_ages and mature_content_screenshots.
Primary trailers for this app
Additional trailers; on the app page, these are shown after screenshots (highlights shown before)
Substitute into trailer_url_format
'video/webm' or 'video/mp4'; can just put this directly in to a <source> tag.
Format for URLs, should substitute filename for ${FILENAME} in the URL.
293x165px.  Use trailer_url_format.
Same size as trailer_max.  Use trailer_url_format.
Trailer ID.  For localized trailers, this will be the original trailer's ID
ELanguage
When the free weekend starts.
When the free weekend ends.
Text to show as a description of the free weekend.
ELanguage
Append to STORE_CDN_URL
Indicates this category can link to search results showing all items in category.
Apps for which we want DLC information.
If specified, we want DLC information for all apps owned by this user.
Total time played over all time.
Time last played on any platform.
